{"id":507965667,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1623704244,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/507965667/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse String","memory":"23.3 MB","code":"#include <algorithm>\n#include <vector>\nusing namespace std;\n\nclass Solution {\nprivate:\n    void helper(vector<char>& s, int start, int end)\n    {\n        if (start >= end) return;\n\n        swap(s[start],s[end]);\n        helper(s,start+1,end-1);\n    }\npublic:\n    void reverseString(vector<char>& s) {\n        helper(s,0,s.size()-1);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-string"}
